Title: Lord-Exorcist
Legend: The bane of the daemon and the gheist, the mystical Lord-Exorcists hold great power over the cleansing of soul-stuff. With their magics, they banish unclean entities while saving the spirits of any who may prove redeemable.
Intro: A Lord-Exorcist is armed with a Redemption Stave.

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.

Rules.Name: Redemptor Casket
Rules.Fluff: Each redemption stave incorporates a casket for the containment of malicious spirits.
Rules.Rule: Slain models cannot be returned to enemy units that are within 9" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Purifying Blast
Rules.Fluff: Slamming his stave onto the ground, the Lord-Exorcist unleashes a wave of power that blasts the spirits of the unworthy from their bodies.
Rules.Rule: Purifying Blast is a spell that has a casting value of 5 and a range of 12". If successfully cast, roll a dice for each enemy unit within range. Add that unitâ€™s Bravery characteristic to the roll. If the result is 12 or less, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
